meaning: You perform your work with high professionalism.

phrase: مَنْ الجَيِّدِ أَنَّ لَدَيْكَ أَحْلَامٌ كَبِيرَةٌ.
meaning: It's great that you have big dreams.

phrase: كُلُّ مَجْهُودَاتِكَ سَتُؤَتِي ثِمَارَهَا يَوْمًا مَا.
meaning: All your efforts will bear fruit one day.
I admire your work ethic and dedication.

phrase: أَتَمَنَّى لَكَ النَّجَاحَ فِي كُلِّ مَا تَفْعَلُ.
meaning: I wish you success in everything you do.
You are capable of achieving your dreams.

phrase: مَا أَجْمَلَ أَنْ تَجِدَ شَغَفَكَ فِي العَمَلِ.
meaning: How wonderful it is to find your passion in work.

phrase: اجْعَلْ مِنْ كُلِّ يَوْمٍ فُرْصَةً لِتَحْسِينِ نَفْسِكَ.
meaning: Make every day an opportunity to improve yourself.

phrase: تَذَكَّرْ أَنَّ التَّعَلُّمَ لَنْ يَتَوَقَّفَ أَبَدًا.
لَا تَخْشَ الفَشَلَ، فَهُوَ خُطْوَةٌ نَحْوَ النَّجَاحِ.
meaning: Don't fear failure; it is a step towards success.
Learn from every experience you go through.

phrase: كُنْ مُلْهِمًا لِلْآخَرِينَ مِنْ خِلَالِ عَمَلِكَ.
meaning: Be an inspiration to others through your work.

phrase: وَثِّقْ فِي قُدُرَاتِكَ، فَأَنتَ تَسْتَحِقُّ كُلَّ النَّجَاحِ.
meaning: Trust your abilities; you deserve all success.
Your work reflects your passion and will.

phrase: تَعَلَّمْ مَعَ كُلِّ صَعُوبَةٍ تَظْهَرُ فِي طَرِيقِكَ.
meaning: Learn with every difficulty that arises in your path.
